Question Text: Date/time payment refused by any participant
Variable Label: Date/time payment refused by any participant
Derivation Notes: Repeated measures associated with Round for display on study manager dashboard
Dictionary: If BioFin_UoCPaymRef_v1r0 equals 1 then SMPaym_JointTmRefused_v1r0 equals BioFin_TmPaymRef_v1r0, If HDPaym_PaymRefused_v1r0 equals 1 then SMPaym_JointTmRefused_v1r0 equals HDPaym_TmRefused_v1r0
